de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute

Interface Attributed


  • public interface Attributed
    Generic attribute access control methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getAttribute(TncAttributeType type)
      Returns the attribute identified by the type.
      void setAttribute(TncAttributeType type, Object value)
      Sets the attribute identified by the type.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        Object getAttribute(TncAttributeType type)
                    throws TncException
        Returns the attribute identified by the type.
        Parameters:
        type - the attribute type
        Returns:
        the attribute of the given type
        Throws:
        TncException - if attribute does not exist or is not readable
        UnsupportedOperationException - if method is not supported

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(TncAttributeType type,
                Object value)
                  throws TncException
        Sets the attribute identified by the type.
        Parameters:
        type - the attribute type
        value - the attribute value
        Throws:
        TncException - if attribute does not exist or is not writable
        UnsupportedOperationException - if method is not supported
